definition[0]: a historic place or building is very old
definition[1]: a historic event or act is very important and will be recorded as part of history
example[3]: a historic meeting of world leaders
example[4]: ‘It is a historic moment, ’ he told journalists.
definition[2]: having taken place or existed in the past
example[5]: It’s unlikely that the share price will exceed historic levels.
definition[3]: historic times are the periods of time whose history has been recorded
example[6]: Extinct volcanoes are those that have not erupted in historic times.
